name: Metal Trump Solid V: The vote Pain
name_original: Metal Trump Solid V: The vote Pain
description:
Game made in 24h at the 2021 Linux GameJAM
(We won btw ;) )

- In 2024, Trump tries to get elected again

 But this time he's really ready to stop the vote counter

 He infiltrates the White House to shut down with the servers

AND STOP THE COUNT !

-In clear :  PUSH THE RED BUTTON !

=> RUN MAIN.EXE

Code & assets by Bendron, LeBelge, UserBoy and Roulalou

Credits to Samuel Lorenc (Eric Vitesse) for the OST https://open.spotify.com/artist/45xNg7sS52hd4PqwJIWqaI
